# fds-image-editor-slider

# Examples

https://components.pages.fdog.de/fds-image-editor-slider/

## Installation
npm i @fds-components/fds-image-editor-slider

## Usage 
``` html
<fds-image-editor-slider></fds-image-editor-slider>
```
